attackStats.name: Attack Speed
attackStats.detail: <bg val={Stage 4}> <bg src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/esp-booster.png} tip={ESP Booster (1st Job)} val={+2}> <bg src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/pure-power.png} tip={Pure Power (2nd Job)} val={+1}>

attackStats.name: Weapon Mastery
attackStats.detail: <bg val={Base +20%}> <bg src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/mastery.png} tip={Mastery (4th Job)} val={+70%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/critical-rush.png} tip={Critical Rush (4th Job)} val={+1% per 30 combo kills}>

attackStats.name: INT
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/esp-mastery.png} tip={ESP Mastery (2nd Job)} val={+40}> <bg type={def} sub={opt} src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/presidents-orders.png} tip={President's Orders (4th Job)} val={+15% to assigned AP} subSrc={/class-icons/5th-job/afterimage-of-the-otherworld.png} subTip={Afterimage of the Otherworld (5th Job)} subVal={extra +50%}>

attackStats.name: Magic Attack
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/common/heros-echo.png} tip={Hero's Echo (Beginner Skill)} val={+4%}> <bg src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-reinforcement.png} tip={Psychic Reinforcement (3rd Job)} val={+10%}> <bg src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/mental-fortitude.png} tip={Mental Fortitude (1st Job)} val={+10}> <bg src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-force.png} tip={Psychic Force - Passive (1st Job)} val={+10}> <bg src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-blast.png} tip={Psychic Blast - Passive (2nd Job)} val={+10}> <bg src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/mental-strength.png} tip={Mental Strength (2nd Job)} val={+10}> <bg src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-assault.png} tip={Psychic Assault (3rd Job)} val={+10}> <bg src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/telepath-tactics.png} tip={Telepath Tactics (4th Job)} val={+50}>

attackStats.name: Crit Rate
attackStats.detail: <bg val={Base +5%}> <bg src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/esp.png} tip={ESP (Beginner Skill)} val={+10%}> <bg src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/esp-mastery.png} tip={ESP Mastery (2nd Job)} val={+10%}> <bg src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/third-eye.png} tip={Third Eye (3rd Job)} val={+20%}>

attackStats.name: Crit Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/link-skills/judgment.png} tip={Judgment (Link Skill)} val={+4%}> <bg src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/third-eye.png} tip={Third Eye (3rd Job)} val={+20%}> <bg src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/mastery.png} tip={Mastery (4th Job)} val={+10%}> <bg type={temp} src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/awakening.png} tip={Awakening (4th Job)} val={+20% to Ultimate skills only}> <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/afterimage-of-the-otherworld.png} tip={Afterimage of the Otherworld (5th Job)} val={+5%}>

attackStats.name: Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/pure-power.png} tip={Pure Power (2nd Job)} val={+20%}> <bg src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/telepath-tactics.png} tip={Telepath Tactics (4th Job)} val={+20%}>

attackStats.name: Final Damage
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/mind-break.png} tip={Mind Break (4th Job)} val={+40%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/telepath-tactics.png} tip={Telepath Tactics (4th Job)} val={+20%}> × <bg src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/awakening.png} tip={Awakening (4th Job)} val={+15%}> × <bg type={debuff} src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/mind-quake.png} tip={Mind Quake (4th Job)} val={+15%}> × <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/otherworld-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Otherworld Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} val={+11%}> × <bg type={opt} src={/class-icons/5th-job/mana-overload.png} tip={Mana Overload (5th Job)} val={+8% while toggled}>

attackStats.name: Ignore DEF
attackStats.detail: <bg src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/mind-scrambler.png} tip={Mind Scrambler (4th Job)} val={+25%}> × <bg type={debuff} src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/mind-quake.png} tip={Mind Quake (4th Job)} val={+15%}> × <bg type={debuff} src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-metal-press.png} tip={Ultimate - Metal Press (1st Job)} src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-clutch.png} tip={Psychic Clutch (4th Job)} src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-psychic-shot.png} tip={Ultimate - Psychic Shot (4th Job)} val={+15%}>

buffInfo.toggles: <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/mental-shield.png} tip={Mental Shield (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/mana-overload.png} tip={Mana Overload (5th Job)}>(30s cd)
buffInfo.summons: <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-drain.png} tip={Psychic Drain (2nd Job)} dur={[30s](3s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/mind-tremor.png} tip={Mind Tremor (3rd Job)} dur={[30s](30s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-trainwreck.png} tip={Ultimate - Trainwreck (3rd Job)} dur={[12s]}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-tornado.png} tip={Psychic Tornado (5th Job)} dur={[20s](180s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-mind-over-matter.png} tip={Ultimate - Mind Over Matter (5th Job)} dur={[15s](60s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-psychic-shockwave.png} tip={Ultimate - Psychic Shockwave (5th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/law-of-gravity.png} tip={Law of Gravity (5th Job)} dur={[22s](60s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/afterimage-of-the-otherworld.png} tip={Afterimage of the Otherworld (5th Job)} dur={[50s](60s cd)}>
buffInfo.buffCd: <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/mental-overdrive.png} tip={Mental Overdrive (Hyper Skill)} dur={[26s](180s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/otherworld-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Otherworld Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} dur={[40s](120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/common/heros-echo.png} tip={Hero's Echo (Beginner Skill)} dur={[2400s](300s cd)}>
buffInfo.binds: <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/mental-shock.png} tip={Mental Shock (Hyper Skill)} dur={[10s](180s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/from-another-realm.png} tip={From Another Realm (6th Job)} dur={[10s](360s cd)}>
buffInfo.iFrame: <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/mental-tempest.png} tip={Mental Tempest (Hyper Skill)} dur={(120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/from-another-realm.png} tip={From Another Realm (6th Job)} dur={(360s cd)}>
buffInfo.damageReduce: <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/otherworld-goddess-blessing.png} tip={Otherworld Goddess's Blessing (5th Job)} dur={[40s, triggers once](-75% | 120s cd)}> <tt src={/class-icons/5th-job/ethereal-form.png} tip={Ethereal Form (5th Job)} dur={[3s](-1600 HP | 60s cd)}>

build: <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/kinetic-step.png} tip={Kinetic Step}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/mental-fortitude.png} tip={Mental Fortitude}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/esp-booster.png} tip={ESP Booster}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-force.png} tip={Psychic Force}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-metal-press.png} tip={Ultimate - Metal Press}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/kinetic-crash.png} tip={Kinetic Crash}>

<tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/mental-strength.png} tip={Mental Strength}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/esp-mastery.png} tip={ESP Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/pure-power.png} tip={Pure Power}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-armor.png} tip={Psychic Armor}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-drain.png} tip={Psychic Drain}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-deep-impact.png} tip={Ultimate - Deep Impact}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-blast.png} tip={Psychic Blast}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/kinetic-piledriver.png} tip={Kinetic Piledriver}>

<tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/kinetic-jaunt.png} tip={Kinetic Jaunt}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/mitigation.png} tip={Mitigation}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/transcendence.png} tip={Transcendence}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-reinforcement.png} tip={Psychic Reinforcement}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-bulwark.png} tip={Psychic Bulwark}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/kinetic-combo.png} tip={Kinetic Combo}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/third-eye.png} tip={Third Eye}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-trainwreck.png} tip={Ultimate - Trainwreck}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/mind-tremor.png} tip={Mind Tremor}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-assault.png} tip={Psychic Assault}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-grab.png} tip={Psychic Grab}>

<tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/mastery.png} tip={Mastery}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/mind-scrambler.png} tip={Mind Scrambler}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/supreme-concentration.png} tip={Supreme Concentration}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/awakening.png} tip={Awakening}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/telepath-tactics.png} tip={Telepath Tactics}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/critical-rush.png} tip={Critical Rush}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/presidents-orders.png} tip={President's Orders}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-clutch.png} tip={Psychic Clutch}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-charger.png} tip={Psychic Charger}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/mind-quake.png} tip={Mind Quake}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-bpm.png} tip={Ultimate - B.P.M.}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/mind-break.png} tip={Mind Break}> -> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/clear-mind.png} tip={Clear Mind}>
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended: <bp_<tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-grab-boss-point.png} tip={Psychic Grab - Boss Point}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-grab-reinforce.png} tip={Psychic Grab - Reinforce}> Psychic Grab - Boss Point and Reinforce_<tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/mind-tremor-overwhelm.png} tip={Mind Tremor - Overwhelm}> Mind Tremor - Overwhelm_<tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/kinetic-combo-opportunity.png} tip={Kinetic Combo - Opportunity}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/kinetic-combo-extra-strike.png} tip={Kinetic Combo - Extra Strike}> Kinetic Combo - Opportunity and Extra Strike_>

nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-grab.png} tip={Psychic Grab (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-metal-press.png} tip={Ultimate - Metal Press (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-trainwreck.png} tip={Ultimate - Trainwreck (3rd Job)}>

<tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-bpm.png} tip={Ultimate - B.P.M. (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/kinetic-combo.png} tip={Kinetic Combo (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-drain.png} tip={Psychic Drain (2nd Job)}>
notes: Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category as you want to max primary first
4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)<bp_Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time_>

possible.nodes: <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-force.png} tip={Psychic Force (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/kinetic-crash.png} tip={Kinetic Crash (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-metal-press.png} tip={Ultimate - Metal Press (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/kinetic-piledriver.png} tip={Kinetic Piledriver (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-deep-impact.png} tip={Ultimate - Deep Impact (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-drain.png} tip={Psychic Drain (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-grab.png} tip={Psychic Grab (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-trainwreck.png} tip={Ultimate - Trainwreck (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/kinetic-combo.png} tip={Kinetic Combo (3rd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/mind-quake.png} tip={Mind Quake (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-bpm.png} tip={Ultimate - B.P.M. (4th Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/mental-tempest.png} tip={Mental Tempest (Hyper Skill)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/mental-shock.png} tip={Mental Shock (Hyper Skill)}>
notes: <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-grab.png} tip={Psychic Grab (3rd Job)}> Psychic Grab also boosts <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-psychic-shot.png} tip={Ultimate - Psychic Shot (4th Job)}> Ultimate - Psychic Shot (4th Job)

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to the members of the Kinesis Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Boost Nodes Build + Inner Ability + Hyper Passive Build

extraContent.title: Psychic Points
extraContent.content: Kinesis does not use MP and instead uses Psychic Points (PP) for special Ultimate skills. PP is generated by using most non-Ultimate skills. Your PP capacity will increase every time you Job Advance (excluding 5th Job)

primary.name: Psychic Attack
primary.shortDesc: Up to 1 enemies attacked 1 times at 100% damage\n[Charges 1 Psychic Points when used]
primary.desc: Deals a ranged attack to one enemy
details: Charges PP when used

primary.name: Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns to Kinesis's Hideout.\nCooldown: 600 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the Lv. 28 quest "Heading Home"

primary.name: ESP
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: 10%, Avoidability: 12%, Speed: +10
details: Upon completing the tutorial, 6 SP are given that can all be allocated to this skill

primary.name: Hero's Echo
primary.shortDesc: Increases Attack Power & Magic ATT by 4% for 2400 sec\nCooldown: 300 sec
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest <link href={https://maplestorywiki.net/w/Quests/112/King:_Master_of_Space_and_Time} title={"King: Master of Space and Time"}>
Affects all nearby players

primary.name: Mental Fortitude
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +30%, Magic ATT: +10, Jump: +10, Speed: +10, and Max Speed: +10

primary.name: Kinetic Crash
primary.shortDesc: Up to 4 enemies attacked 2 times at 140% damage\n[Charges 1 Psychic Points when used]
primary.desc: Toss enemies in front of you up and down
details: Charges PP when used

primary.name: Psychic Force
primary.shortDesc:
Enemies Knocked Back: 4, Damage Over Time: 20%, Damage Over Time Duration: 30 sec, Damage Increase During Damage Over Time: 10% per sec, Max Increase During Damage Over Time: 200%
Cooldown: 1 sec
[Passive Effect - Magic ATT: +10]
[Psychic Points Charged During Skill Use: 1]
primary.desc: Push enemies back while applying a damaging debuff
details: [Passive]: Permanently grants flat Magic Attack
Charges PP when used

primary.name: Ultimate - Metal Press
primary.shortDesc: Psychic Point Cost: 7. Damage: 120%, Number of Attacks: 10, Max Enemies Hit: 12, DEF on damaged enemies: -15%, DEF reduction duration: 30 sec.
primary.desc: Drop a metal object forward that damages and debuffs enemies
details: [Debuff]: Reduces %DEF<bp_Does not stack with debuffs from <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-clutch.png} tip={Psychic Clutch (4th Job)}> and <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-psychic-shot.png} tip={Ultimate - Psychic Shot (4th Job)}>_Reduction to %DEF can be considered as %Ignore DEF_>

primary.name: Mental Shield
primary.shortDesc: Cancel 60% of damage received by consuming 1 Psychic Point. Can be toggled On/Off

primary.name: ESP Booster
primary.shortDesc: Duration: 180 sec, Attack Speed: +2

primary.name: Kinetic Step
primary.shortDesc: Jump a set distance
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
While in the air, you can press the Up Key and Jump Key together to perform a vertical jump
Horizontal jump can be used twice in a row

primary.name: Kinetic Piledriver
primary.shortDesc: Up to 8 enemies attacked 2 times at 280% damage\n[Charges 1 Psychic Points when used]
primary.desc: Lift enemies into the air and smash them down
details: Charges PP when used

primary.name: ESP Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Psy-limiter Mastery: +50%, Critical Rate: +10%, and INT: +40

primary.name: Psychic Blast
primary.shortDesc:
Enemies Knocked Back: 6, Damage Over Time: 40%, Damage Over Time Duration: 30 sec, Damage Increase During Damage Over Time: 25% per sec, Max Increase During Damage Over Time: 400%
Cooldown: 1 sec
[Passive Effect - Magic ATT: +10]
[Psychic Points Charged During Skill Use: 1]
primary.desc: Pull enemies from above to your platform
details: Activated by pressing the Down Arrow Key and <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-force.png} tip={Psychic Force (1st Job)}> together
Increases %Damage Over Time and max enemies knocked back
Increases %Damage Increase during Damage Over Time and max amount of %Damage Increase
Increases Magic Attack provided

primary.name: Psychic Drain
primary.shortDesc: Max Enemies Hit: 5, Damage: 150%, Duration: 30 sec. Restores 1 Psychic Point on each use upon attacking normal enemies, Cooldown: 3 sec\n[Passive Effect: 40% chance to restore 1 Psychic Points upon attacking bosses]
details: [Passive]: Permanently grants successful attacks on a boss a chance to restore 1 Psychic Point
Regular Monsters damaged by the area grants 1 Psychic Point
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Ultimate - Deep Impact
primary.shortDesc: Psychic Point 2 consumed. Damage: 170%, Max Enemies Hit: 4, Number of Attacks: 7. Removes all buffs of enemies hit\n[Ultimate - Metal Press]s Damage: +130% points
primary.desc: Leap into the air and dive downwards diagonally
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-metal-press.png} tip={Ultimate - Metal Press (1st Job)}>
Attack is considered a teleport and can be used to dodge certain attacks
Enemies hit will have all buffs removed
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Psychic Armor
primary.shortDesc: Dodge Chance: 20%, Defense: +300

primary.name: Pure Power
primary.shortDesc: Damage: +20%, Attack Speed: +1

primary.name: Mental Strength
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +20%, Magic ATT: +10, Jump: +10, Speed: +10, and Max Speed: +10

primary.name: Psychic Grab
primary.shortDesc: 3 enemies lifted up and controlled with the powers of psychokinesis.\n[Psychic Smash]: Enemies Hit Including Grabbed Enemy: 8, Damage: 340%, Number of Attacks: 3. Recovers 1 Psychic Point.
primary.desc: Lift up enemies or objects and use them to attack
details: You cannot lift bosses or enemies much higher level than you
Charges PP when used

primary.name: Psychic Assault
primary.shortDesc:
Enemies Knocked Back: 8, Damage Over Time: 75%, Damage Over Time Duration: 30 sec, Damage Increase During Damage Over Time: 50% per sec, Max Increase During Damage Over Time: 700%
Cooldown: 1 sec
[Passive Effect - Magic ATT: +10]
[Psychic Points Charged During Skill Use: 1]
details: Increases %Damage Over Time and max enemies knocked back
Increases %Damage Increase during Damage Over Time and max amount of %Damage Increase
Increases Magic Attack provided

primary.name: Mind Tremor
primary.shortDesc:
Reduces up to 5 enemies' speed by 25%. Ignores an additional 10% DEF and applies a debuff that increases Final Damage by 10% to Kinesis's attack.
Duration: 30. For enemies who leave the area of effect, the debuff lingers for a time equal to the time they spent in the area of effect.
[Psychic Point recovery during skill use: 1]
Cooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Create a debuffing area on the ground that also slows and reduces enemy %DEF
details: [Debuff]: Increases %Final Damage dealt to enemy<bp_For enemies that leave the zone, the debuff duration is equal to the duration spent within it_>
Reduction to %DEF can be considered as %Ignore DEF
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Ultimate - Trainwreck
primary.shortDesc: Psychic Points Consumption: 15, Max Enemies hit: 5, Damage: 120%, Number of Attacks: 6, Duration: 12 sec, Ultimate - Trainwreck Damage during damage duration: -5%\n[Ultimate - Metal Press] Damage: +140%\n[Ultimate - Deep Impact] Damage: +100%
primary.desc: Summon a train that continuously smashes down on an area
details: [Passive]: Increases %Damage of <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-metal-press.png} tip={Ultimate - Metal Press (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-deep-impact.png} tip={Ultimate - Deep Impact (2nd Job)}>
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Kinetic Combo
primary.shortDesc: 70% chance to automatically attack nearby enemies with surrounding objects for 350% damage when attack hits.
primary.desc: Successful attacks have a chance to create an additional attack that seek and attack a nearby enemy
details: Does not activate from Ultimate-type skills, <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-force.png} tip={Psychic Force (1st Job)}>, <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-drain.png} tip={Psychic Drain (2nd Job)}>, <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-psychic-shot.png} tip={Ultimate - Psychic Shot (4th Job)}>, or <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/mental-tempest.png} tip={Mental Tempest (Hyper Skill)}>

primary.name: Psychic Bulwark
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases Defense by 200 and Knockback Resistance by 100%.
details: Increases DEF provided
Now increases %Knockback Resistance

primary.name: Kinetic Jaunt
primary.shortDesc: Move up quickly and in selected directions. Duration increases with skill level.\nCasting this skill while using other skills costs 2 Psychic Points\nCooldown: 4 sec
primary.desc: While held, levitate up into the air
details: You can move while this skill is held
Costs PP when cast while using other skills and the cooldown is increased (to 8 sec)

primary.name: Psychic Reinforcement
primary.shortDesc: Magic ATT: +10%

primary.name: Third Eye
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +20%, Critical Damage: +20%

primary.name: Transcendence
primary.shortDesc: Abnormal Status Resistance: +20, Elemental Resistance: +30%

primary.name: Mitigation
primary.shortDesc: Damage Taken: -15%

primary.name: Psychic Clutch
primary.shortDesc: Lifts 5 enemies and controls them with the powers of psychokinesis.\n[Psychic Smash]: Enemies Hit, Including Grabbed Enemy: 8, Damage: 470%, Number of Attacks: 5. Recovers 1 Psychic Point, DEF on damaged enemies: -15%, DEF reduction duration: 30 sec.
details: Now applies a debuff that reduces %DEF to enemies hit<bp_Does not stack with debuffs from <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-metal-press.png} tip={Ultimate - Metal Press (1st Job)}> and <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-psychic-shot.png} tip={Ultimate - Psychic Shot (4th Job)}>_Reduction to %DEF can be considered as %Ignore DEF_>
Increases %Damage, number of hits, and max enemies hit
Increases amount of enemies grabbed

primary.name: Ultimate - Psychic Shot
primary.shortDesc: Psychic Point Cost: 5. Damage per projectile: 300%, Number of Attacks: 3, DEF of enemies hit: -15%, DEF reduction duration: 30 sec
primary.desc: Throw the objects currently grabbed with <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-clutch.png} tip={Psychic Clutch (4th Job)}> forward, damaging and debuffing enemies hit
details: [Debuff]: Reduces %DEF<bp_Does not stack with debuffs from <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-metal-press.png} tip={Ultimate - Metal Press (1st Job)}> and <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-clutch.png} tip={Psychic Clutch (4th Job)}>_Reduction to %DEF can be considered as %Ignore DEF_>
Shares Skill Points (SP) with <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-clutch.png} tip={Psychic Clutch (4th Job)}>
Can be activated by pressing the Up Key and <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-grab.png} tip={Psychic Grab (3rd Job)}> together

primary.name: Ultimate - B.P.M.
primary.shortDesc:
Enemies Hit: 3, Damage: 175%, Number of Attacks: 7. When activated once, consumes 1 slot(s) of Psychic Points
Attack stops when Psychic Points are consumed, resumes attack when recovering more than 3 Psychic Points.
Cooldown: 0.5 sec
[Ultimate - Metal Press] Damage: +310%p
[Ultimate - Deep Impact] Damage: +270%p
[Ultimate - Trainwreck] Damage: +100%p
primary.desc: While active, continuously strike forward with a barrage of psychic punches
details: [Passive]: Increases %Damage by a flat amount for the following skills: <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-metal-press.png} tip={Ultimate - Metal Press (1st Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-deep-impact.png} tip={Ultimate - Deep Impact (2nd Job)}> <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-trainwreck.png} tip={Ultimate - Trainwreck (3rd Job)}>
Consumes PP only when attack successfully hits<bp_Attack automatically stops when all PP is consumed and resumes when at least 3 PP is available_>
Can be used while casting other skills
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Mind Quake
primary.shortDesc:
Initial hit - Max Enemies hit: 5, Damage: 1000%, Number of Attacks: 4.
Reduces speed of enemies within the area by 30%.
Ignores an additional 15% DEF and applies a debuff that increases Final Damage by 15% to Kinesis's attack.
Duration: 30. For enemies who leave the area of effect, the debuff lingers for a time equal to the time they spent in the area of effect.
[Psychic Point recovery during skill use: 1]
Cooldown: 30 sec
details: Now damages enemies on initial hit
Increases slow and %DEF reduction effect
Increases %Final Damage from debuff

primary.name: Mind Break
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage 40% increase

primary.name: President's Orders
primary.shortDesc: Goddess of the Otherworld appears\n[Passive Effect: All stats with a direct AP investment increase by 15%]
details: Skill is a passive, the active effect does nothing except displays an animation

primary.name: Psychic Charger
primary.shortDesc: Charges 50% of the maximum points to reach maximum Psychic Points when used.\nCooldown: 45 sec\n[Passive Effect - Damage when attacking Boss: +30%]
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Boss Damage

primary.name: Clear Mind
primary.shortDesc: Clear Status\nCooldown: 180 sec\n[Passive Effect - Abnormal Status Resistance: +20]
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for a few seconds
details: [Passive]: Increases Abnormal Status Resistance

primary.name: Telepath Tactics
primary.shortDesc: Magic ATT: +50, Damage: +20%, Final Damage: +20%

primary.name: Awakening
primary.shortDesc: Final Damage: +15%, Ultimate Skill Critical Damage: +20%

primary.name: Supreme Concentration
primary.shortDesc: Buff Duration: +20%

primary.name: Critical Rush
primary.shortDesc: The gap between the minimum and maximum damage decreases a fixed amount every time you get 30 combo kills.
details: Combo kills refer to 'Combo' text that appears when you defeat an enemy
Every 30 combo kills grants 1% Weapon Mastery

primary.name: Mind Scrambler
primary.shortDesc: Defense Ignored: 25%

primary.name: Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Weapon Mastery: +70%, Critical Damage: +10%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now increases %Crit Damage

hyperPassive.name: Psychic Grab - Boss Point
details: Increases PP charge when attacking bosses with <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-grab.png} tip={Psychic Grab (3rd Job)}>

hyperPassive.name: Psychic Grab - Reinforce
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Psychic Smash and Psychic Shot Damage: +20%

hyperPassive.name: Psychic Grab - Steel Skin
details: Grants a %DEF buff when used

hyperActive.name: Mental Tempest
hyperActive.shortDesc: Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 400%, Max Projectiles: 16, Final Blow Damage: 1500%, Final Blow activates critical damage with Ignore DEF: +50%\nGrants invincibility during skill casting, and Psychic Points increase to maximum immediately upon casting.\nCooldown: 120 sec
hyperActive.desc: Unleash a barrage Ultimate attacks before releasing a final blow
details: The final blow is a guaranteed Critical Hit and has increased %Ignore DEF
While casting, you are invincible and instantly gain max PP

hyperActive.name: Mental Shock
hyperActive.shortDesc: Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1800%, Number of Attacks: 1, Stun Duration: 10 sec.\nStun Duration: +100% depending on damage inflicted with Mental Shock.\nCooldown: 180 sec
hyperActive.desc: Unleash a shockwave that binds nearby enemies

hyperActive.name: Mental Overdrive
hyperActive.shortDesc: Reduces Psychic Point consumption by half for 26 sec while increasing the Psychic Points are continuously increased.\nCooldown: 180 sec
details: <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/ultimate-bpm.png} tip={Ultimate - B.P.M (4th Job)}> is not affected by reduced PP consumption

fifthMain.name: Psychic Tornado
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Psychic Point Cost: 15, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 1650%, Number of Attacks: 8, Duration: 20 sec
The tornado grows and grows until the skill ends or is used again, causing the objects inside to be thrown forward.
Thrown Object - Deals 433% damage on up to 10 enemies 4 times and explodes 6 times, dealing 975% damage up to 10 enemies 10 times. Final Damage increases up to 3 times in proportion to the object's size.
Cooldown: 180 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Create a cube above your head that damages nearby enemies while slowly growing bigger
details: Objects are also thrown out of the cube damaging enemies hit<bp_Based on the size of the object, the %Final Damage of the attack will be increased_>
Upon growing to the maximum size, the cube will be thrown and explode
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Ultimate - Mind Over Matter
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Psychic Point Cost: 10, Duration: 15 sec, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Damage: 1485%, Number of Attacks: 5
While traveling towards you, object moves at 75% speed.
If you use the skill again or use the down arrow key to use Psychic Force during a boss atack, you can move the matter for 3 more sec.
Inflicts an additional 1045% damage to up to 12 enemies 12 times when the object disappears.
Cooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: Create a giant object that travels forward damaging enemies and explodes upon expiring
details: The object can be pushed by using <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-assault.png} tip={Psychic Assault (3rd Job)}> or by pressing the Skill Key to redirect the object towards you

The object will stop upon colliding with a boss monster<bp_The object can be moved by pressing the Skill Key or pressing the Down Arrow Key and <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-assault.png} tip={Psychic Assault (3rd Job)}> together_>
Upon hitting the edge of the map, the object will bounce back
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Ultimate - Psychic Shockwave
fifthMain.shortDesc: Psychic Point Cost: 3. Attacks the enemies you're lifting and up to 8 enemies in front of you to deal 1210% damage 6 time(s). Charges 1 Psychic Points when the skill lands successfully.\nMicro Black Hole: Activates a black hole 4 times. Damage: 1100%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 3. Charges 1 Psychic Point slot(s) when the skill hits a target.
fifthMain.desc: Throw the objects currently grabbed with <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-clutch.png} tip={Psychic Clutch (4th Job)}> forward and create a black hole at the max distance
details: Can be activated by pressing the Down Arrow Key and <tt src={/class-icons/other/kinesis/psychic-grab.png} tip={Psychic Grab (3rd Job)}> together
The black hole charges PP when skill damages an enemy
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Law of Gravity
fifthMain.shortDesc:
Psychic Point Cost: 5, Enemies Hit: 1, Damage: 440%, Number of Attacks: 6, Debuff Duration: 22
Periodically attacks up to 6 enemies with 1100% damage 8 times and pulls them in. Reduces the activation interval up to 3 times in proportion to the number of enemies pulled in so far, and Final Damage of the attack increases by 40%. If there is no enemy to pull in, objects will get pulled in instead. It will be regarded as the max number of enemies that can be attacked.
Upon ending, it explodes to attack up to 10 enemies with 1320% damage 15 times.
Cooldown: 60 sec
fifthMain.desc: Damage and debuff an enemy causing them to pull in nearby enemies and objects
details: If the enemy is defeated, an orb will take its place and also pull in nearby enemies and objects
Based on the number of enemies pulled in, the attack's frequency and %Final Damage will be increased
If no enemies are nearby to pull in, the objects that are pulled in will be treated as enemies instead
At the end of the duration, the attack will explode, damaging nearby enemies
Prioritizes enemies with the highest max HP first
Unaffected by Damage Reflect

meta: Kinesis is an INT mage class part of the FriendStory class group. Kinesis utilize Psy-limiter as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Kinesis can equip Chess Piece
